testcase.classname: US1002 kullanici JPH endpoint'ine Post request gonderir
testcase.name: TCO2 Kullanici Post request sonucu donen response'i test eder
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici "jPHBaseUrl" base URL'ini kullanir..........................passed Then Path parametreleri icin "posts/70" kullanir............................passed And POST request icin "Ahmet", "Merhaba", 10 70 bilgileri ile request body olusturur.passed And jPH server a POST request gonderir ve testleri yapmak icin response degerini kaydede.passed Then jPH respons'da status degerinin 200....................................passed And jPH respons 'da content type degerinin "application/json; charset=utf-8".passed And jPH respons daki "Connection" header degerinin "keep-alive".............passed Then response attribute 'lerindeki degerlerinin "Ahmet", "Merhaba", 10 70...passed
